post:
Hi,

Here's an offer I put together so i can make better use of my dedicated server which I've had for a quite some time and is underutilized for my purposes. FYI, I have a vps on the box using the remaining resources.

The offer:

1 dedicated cpu @ 2.8Ghz (i5 2300)

The cpu can be used completely all the time without being suspended, since the allocation is dedicated to your vps.

4gb ddr3 ram
200GB disk space
IPv4 address
OpenVZ + CP
50mbit in / 50mbit out unmetered
ddos protection

All the above resources are dedicated.

Hosted at OVH rbx. Use should be in line with the OVH dedicated server TOS and AUP. So nothing illegal. Limited offer, only 2 available.
I'm selling these slices to make better use of the available resources on the server.


Any interest?
